name: Kyoko
introduce: Kyoko Finance is a DAO-to-DAO credit provider, P2P NFT lending platform, and cross-chain GameFi NFT lending market for guilds and players. Kyoko offers a one-stop platform that provides liquidity to the Web3 and GameFi industries. Through its DAO-to-DAO lending, Kyoko provides DAOs and Guilds with the liquidity they require to maintain operations while also allowing them to stake their onhand resources as collateral for larger credit loans. Kyoko also bridges high-potential DAOs and Guilds with the industry connections and resources they need to grow.
